Uses of Class
aim4.voronoi.Edge

  • Packages that use Edge 
    Package Description
    aim4.voronoi  

    • Uses of Edge in aim4.voronoi

      Fields in aim4.voronoi declared as Edge 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Edge QuadEdge.edge
      the "canonical" edge in this QuadEdge structure
      Edge Edge.invrotEdge
      the next edge of 4 (clockwise) in the edge QuadEdge
      Edge Edge.next
      the next edge counterclockwise from the origin vertex
      Edge Edge.rotEdge
      the next edge of 4 (counterclockwise) in the edge QuadEdge
      Methods in aim4.voronoi that return Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge Edge.connect(Edge edge2)
      Add a new edge connecting the destination of this edge to the origin of edge2 in such a way that all three have the same left face after the connection is complete.
      Edge Edge.dNext()
      Gets the next edge we find that enters this edge's destination vertex as we go around that vertex counterclockwise from this edge.
      Edge Edge.dPrev()
      Gets the next edge we find that enters this edge's destination vertex as we go around that vertex clockwise from this edge.
      Edge Edge.invRot()
      Gets the edge from the left face to the right face relative to this edge (think of this as the edge that is rotated -90 degrees from this edge).
      Edge Edge.lNext()
      Gets the edge that follows this edge in a counterclockwise traversal of the face to the left of this edge.
      Edge Edge.lPrev()
      Gets the edge that precedes this edge in a counterclockwise traversal of the face to the left of this edge.
      Edge Edge.oNext()
      Gets the next edge we find that leaves this edge's origin vertex as we go around that vertex counterclockwise from this edge.
      Edge Edge.oPrev()
      Gets the next edge we find that leaves this edge's origin vertex as we go around that vertex clockwise from this edge.
      Edge Edge.rNext()
      Gets the edge that follows this edge in a counterclockwise traversal of the face to the right of this edge (note that such a traversal goes opposite the direction of this edge).
      Edge Edge.rot()
      Gets the edge from the right face to the left face relative to this edge (think of this as the edge that is rotated 90 degrees from this edge).
      Edge Edge.rPrev()
      Gets the edge that precedes this edge in a counterclockwise traversal of the face to the right of this edge (note that such a traversal goes opposite the direction of this edge).
      Edge Edge.sym()
      Gets the edge that connects the same two vertices as this edge, but with opposite orientation.
      Methods in aim4.voronoi with parameters of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge Edge.connect(Edge edge2)
      Add a new edge connecting the destination of this edge to the origin of edge2 in such a way that all three have the same left face after the connection is complete.
      boolean Vertex.isLeftOf(Edge edge)
      Tests whether a point lies to the left of an edge.
      boolean Vertex.isOnEdge(Edge edge)
      Tests whether this point lies on an edge (within some small epsilon).
      boolean Vertex.isRightOf(Edge edge)
      Tests whether a point lies to the right of an edge.
      static void Edge.splice(Edge edge1, Edge edge2)
      Implementation of the Splice topological primitive from Guibas & Stolfi (1985).
